A civic-focused initiative integrating behavioral psychology and predictive modeling to enhance resilience in Albany, NY.

SPSS-Based Behavioral Risk Assessment Framework

2022

Developed to score and visualize behavioral risk indicators in clinical settings. Useful for pre-screening, monitoring, or review.
